Module hanyaeger
Package com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities

Class Debugger

java.lang.Object
com.github.hanyaeger.core.entities.Debugger
All Implemented Interfaces:
StatisticsObserver
public class Debugger extends Object implements StatisticsObserver
The Debugger is used to gather and show in-game debug information.
